# Material project - batteries
```{r setup, echo = F, cache = T}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
```

## Data
```{r readFile, cache=TRUE}
mp <- read.csv("data/mp_batteries.csv", header = T) %>% 
  drop_na(Battery.ID, Battery.Formula) %>%
  mutate_if(is.numeric, ~replace_na(., 0)) %>%
  mutate_if(is.character, ~replace_na(., "?"))
```
``` {r glace}
knitr::kable(head(mp, 10))
```
``` {r summaries_char}
mp %>% summarise(n())
mp %>% select(Battery.Formula:Formula.Discharge) %>% 
  summarise_all(list(n_distinct)) %>% knitr::kable()
```
``` {r summarize_num}
mp %>% select(Max.Delta.Volume:Stability.Discharge) %>%
  summarise_all(summary)

mp%>% ggplot(aes(x=Steps)) + geom_histogram(binwidth = 1) +
  xlim(-1, 5)
mp %>% ggplot(aes(x=Max.Voltage.Step)) + geom_histogram(binwidth = 1) +
  xlim(-1, 5)
```
